mutateDoubleAboveZero

protected double mutateDoubleAboveZero(double originalValue,
                                       int maxMutationRate)
Will calculate acceptable value for double mutation, not dipping below 0 Note: Mutation rate must be an integer

Parameters:
double - originalValue The value to be altered
int - maxMutationRate The maximum amount that could be added/subtracted
Returns:
double The new mutated value, following appropriate calculations

mutateIntAboveZero

protected int mutateIntAboveZero(int originalValue,
                                 int maxMutationRate)
Will calculate acceptable value for integer mutation, not dipping below 0

Parameters:
int - originalValue The value to be altered
int - maxMutationRate The maximum amount that could be added/subtracted
Returns:
int The new mutated value, following appropriate calculations

mutateWithinIntBounds

protected int mutateWithinIntBounds(int originalValue,
                                    int maxMutationRate,
                                    int max,
                                    int min)
Will calculate an acceptable value for an integer mutation, that does not surpass given boundaries

Parameters:
int - originalValue The original value to be altered
int - maxMutationRate The maximum amount that the above value can be changed
int - max The maximum of the range of values to be returned
int - min The minimum of the range of values to be returned
Returns:
int The new value, calculated to fit within the range
